body_html: @zhyj3038 hello, the problem is that when using float model, you must allocate 4 * 270000 = 1080000 because the float is 32bit and the quantized version of model is 8bit. You must change the input allocated buffer to match your model type.

body: @zhyj3038 hello, the problem is that when using float model, you must allocate 4 * 270000 = 1080000 because the float is 32bit and the quantized version of model is 8bit. You must change the input allocated buffer to match your model type.
